text: Agboola Ojomo Agunloye was the paramount Yoruba king of Ijebu, Owo in Ondo State, southwestern Nigeria. He died on March 2004 and was succeeded by King Kofoworola Oladoyinbo Ojomo, who ascended the throne on 13 June 2004. ==References== Category:Yoruba monarchs Category:Nigerian traditional rulers Category:People from Owo Category:2004 deaths
title: Agboola Ojomo Agunloye
